page.title: 05FEATHERSTONE
page.content: Our area is mainly farmland but also contains a large 16th century farmhouse. There is also part of {Purston Jaglin,}the main town, but the part we are concerned with is Featherstone. In Featherstone there is an old people's home and some old people's bungalows.{Featherstone}is a typical Yorkshire town and lots of people suffered hardship during the miners strike which took place in Britain during 1984_85. There is also an adventure playground surrounded by the old peoples bungalows and Council houses. From here you can see the old sewage works which was converted into an electrical pump in 1981 and this pumps straight through to Normanton pumping station.
